subject: Editing an order
description_text:
Hi,

I have recently purchased a pedal set (on Wednesday). I have just noticed
that you offer the pre black friday sale. If I had known that you would
offer that I would have waited and got the clutch as well. Is it possible
to add it to my order, or has it been sent already (haven't got any info
about it being sent)?

Thanks,
Lukas Jarmara

conversations.body_text: Hi Lukáš Jarmara,    Don't worry, we can adjust your order for you. 251.90(Plus X P3-H3 ) - 175.90(Plus X P2-H2 ) + 9.9(shipping) - 45(offer) = 40.9(difference). You only need to pay the $40.9 difference. You can click this link to make the payment, and we'll modify your order. https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2

Hi,

may I ask why I need to pay the shipping again? Or is it an upgrade to the
standart shipping from economy shipping?

Thanks for clarification,
Lukas Jarmara
Hi Lukáš Jarmara,    No, this is your original shipping fee, but we'll arrange delivery for you via DHL. Please don't worry.  ​

Hi,

so it will come in a different package than the pedals?

Thanks,
Lukáš Jarmara
Hi Lukáš Jarmara,    Plus X Pedal has only one layer of packaging, and all its packaging are identical.

Hi,

then I still don’t get why I need to pay the shipping fee if I have already
paid it for the previous shipping (the two pedal set), is it just heavier
and thus need to pay more, or have you already sent it and thus would need
to ship it again?

Thanks,
Lukáš Jarmara
Hi Lukáš Jarmara,     You simply subtract 251.90 (Plus X P3-H3) minus the 165.9 you originally paid for Plus X P2-H2, then subtract 45 (the offer) = 41 (the difference).

Hi,

ok turns out I am just bad at maths. Paid in full.

Apologies,
Lukas Jarmara
Okay, we'll ship your order as soon as possible.

Great, thanks, looking forward to them a lot.

Best,
Lukas Jarmara
